name: Taco Beef with Mushrooms and Pasta
instructions:
Boil pasta in salted water 8–10 min until al dente; drain.
Slice mushrooms thinly. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok/skillet over high; stir-fry mushrooms 2–3 min until crisp-tender. Remove to a plate.
Stir-fry beef in 1 tbsp oil over high 3–5 min (seafood 2–3) until cooked. Steaks: 145°F (63°C) for medium; ground beef 160°F (71°C).
Toss beef and mushrooms with the sauce and hot pasta; add pasta water as needed to coat. Serve immediately.

name: Mediterranean Turkey with Spinach and Rice
instructions:
Cook rice 15–20 min until tender; keep warm.
Saute spinach in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season turkey with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal.
Add olives, tomatoes, and oregano; simmer 4–5 min.
Combine turkey, spinach, and sauce (if any). Spoon over rice; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Pan-Seared Chicken with Spinach and Couscous
instructions:
Pour boiling water over couscous, cover 5 min; fluff with fork.
Saute spinach in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season chicken with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal.
Combine chicken, spinach, and sauce (if any). Spoon over couscous; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Cajun Chicken with Onion and Rice
instructions:
Cook rice 15–20 min until tender; keep warm.
Saute onion in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season chicken with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal.
Sprinkle Cajun seasoning; add a splash of broth; simmer 2–3 min.
Combine chicken, onion, and sauce (if any). Spoon over rice; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Soup Seafood with Carrots and Couscous
instructions:
Pour boiling water over couscous, cover 5 min; fluff with fork.
Saute carrots in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season seafood. Combine with aromatics, carrots, spices, and 1 cup broth; simmer gently 30–45 min (slow cooker 4–6 hrs LOW) until tender. Cook until opaque and flakes easily (145°F / 63°C).
Combine seafood, carrots, and sauce (if any). Spoon over couscous; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Cajun Beef with Spinach and Pasta
instructions:
Boil pasta in salted water 8–10 min until al dente; drain.
Saute spinach in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season beef with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Steaks: 145°F (63°C) for medium; ground beef 160°F (71°C).
Sprinkle Cajun seasoning; add a splash of broth; simmer 2–3 min.
Toss beef and spinach with the sauce and hot pasta; add pasta water as needed to coat. Serve immediately.

name: Soup Beef with Zucchini and Potatoes
instructions:
Roast diced potatoes at 425°F (220°C) for 20–25 min until crisp.
Saute zucchini in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season beef. Combine with aromatics, zucchini, spices, and 1 cup broth; simmer gently 30–45 min (slow cooker 4–6 hrs LOW) until tender. Steaks: 145°F (63°C) for medium; ground beef 160°F (71°C).
Plate roasted potatoes, top with beef and zucchini; spoon over any pan juices or sauce.

name: Creamy Tofu with Tomatoes and Pasta
instructions:
Boil pasta in salted water 8–10 min until al dente; drain.
Saute tomatoes in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season tofu with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook until lightly crisp and heated through (5–7 min).
Add a splash of cream or milk; simmer 2–3 min until velvety.
Toss tofu and tomatoes with the sauce and hot pasta; add pasta water as needed to coat. Serve immediately.

name: Smoky Lamb with Bell pepper and Tortillas
instructions:
Warm tortillas 30–60 seconds per side in a dry skillet.
Saute bell pepper in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season lamb with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to at least 145°F (63°C).
Fill warm tortillas with lamb and bell pepper; add toppings (salsa, lime, herbs) and serve.

name: Thai-Style Beans with Spinach and Quinoa
instructions:
Simmer quinoa 15 min (1 cup quinoa to 2 cups water); fluff.
Slice spinach thinly. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok/skillet over high; stir-fry spinach 2–3 min until crisp-tender. Remove to a plate.
Stir-fry beans in 1 tbsp oil over high 3–5 min (seafood 2–3) until cooked. Simmer until hot and tender throughout.
Stir in coconut milk and curry paste; simmer 5–7 min.
Combine beans, spinach, and sauce (if any). Spoon over quinoa; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Herb-Crusted Pork with Green beans and Quinoa
instructions:
Simmer quinoa 15 min (1 cup quinoa to 2 cups water); fluff.
Toss green beans with 1 tbsp oil, salt, and pepper on a sheet pan; roast at 400°F (205°C) for 12–15 min until tender.
Season pork with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal; rest 3 min.
Combine pork, green beans, and sauce (if any). Spoon over quinoa; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

Combine beef, onion, and sauce (if any). Spoon over couscous; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Tomato Basil Pork with Broccoli and Rice
instructions:
Cook rice 15–20 min until tender; keep warm.
Saute broccoli in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season pork with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal; rest 3 min.
Add crushed tomatoes and basil; simmer 8–10 min.
Combine pork, broccoli, and sauce (if any). Spoon over rice; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Mediterranean Pork with Zucchini and Rice
instructions:
Cook rice 15–20 min until tender; keep warm.
Saute zucchini in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season pork with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal; rest 3 min.
Add olives, tomatoes, and oregano; simmer 4–5 min.
Combine pork, zucchini, and sauce (if any). Spoon over rice; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Soup Pork with Bell pepper and Tortillas
instructions:
Warm tortillas 30–60 seconds per side in a dry skillet.
Saute bell pepper in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season pork. Combine with aromatics, bell pepper, spices, and 1 cup broth; simmer gently 30–45 min (slow cooker 4–6 hrs LOW) until tender. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal; rest 3 min.
Fill warm tortillas with pork and bell pepper; add toppings (salsa, lime, herbs) and serve.

name: Garlic Butter Pork with Broccoli and Couscous
instructions:
Pour boiling water over couscous, cover 5 min; fluff with fork.
Saute broccoli in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season pork with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal; rest 3 min.
Finish with butter and minced garlic; cook 1 min until fragrant.
Combine pork, broccoli, and sauce (if any). Spoon over couscous; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Soup Beef with Onion and Tortillas
instructions:
Warm tortillas 30–60 seconds per side in a dry skillet.
Saute onion in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season beef. Combine with aromatics, onion, spices, and 1 cup broth; simmer gently 30–45 min (slow cooker 4–6 hrs LOW) until tender. Steaks: 145°F (63°C) for medium; ground beef 160°F (71°C).
Fill warm tortillas with beef and onion; add toppings (salsa, lime, herbs) and serve.

name: Creamy Seafood with Mushrooms and Tortillas
instructions:
Warm tortillas 30–60 seconds per side in a dry skillet.
Saute mushrooms in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season seafood with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook until opaque and flakes easily (145°F / 63°C).
Add a splash of cream or milk; simmer 2–3 min until velvety.
Fill warm tortillas with seafood and mushrooms; add toppings (salsa, lime, herbs) and serve.

name: Fajita Turkey with Kale and Rice
instructions:
Cook rice 15–20 min until tender; keep warm.
Slice kale thinly. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok/skillet over high; stir-fry kale 2–3 min until crisp-tender. Remove to a plate.
Stir-fry turkey in 1 tbsp oil over high 3–5 min (seafood 2–3) until cooked. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal.
Combine turkey, kale, and sauce (if any). Spoon over rice; garnish as desired. Serve hot.

name: Honey Mustard Pork with Broccoli and Pasta
instructions:
Boil pasta in salted water 8–10 min until al dente; drain.
Saute broccoli in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season pork with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal; rest 3 min.
Stir in honey and Dijon; simmer 2–3 min until glossy.
Toss pork and broccoli with the sauce and hot pasta; add pasta water as needed to coat. Serve immediately.

name: Tomato Basil Lamb with Onion and Potatoes
instructions:
Roast diced potatoes at 425°F (220°C) for 20–25 min until crisp.
Saute onion in 1 tbsp oil over medium 4–5 min until tender; season lightly.
Season lamb with salt and pepper. Sear in 1–2 tbsp oil over medium-high 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3) until browned. Cook to at least 145°F (63°C).
Add crushed tomatoes and basil; simmer 8–10 min.
Plate roasted potatoes, top with lamb and onion; spoon over any pan juices or sauce.
